title: Game A as Hierarchical Constantinian Christendom vs Game B as Egalitarian Rebellion. PVK Q/A Oct 22
description:
Questions from the BoM Discord server
0:00:15  Start of transmission / Intro / important announcements
0:02:45  In what ways are we responsible for conscious perception of the body of Christ?
0:03:40  Cool idea for crowd sourcing e-mail / shout out to young YouTubers
0:05:40  What’s the ideal father?
0:07:35  What does God want for his children?
0:09:50  Is JBP wrong about the term “the Meek?”
0:14:30  What does the pattern of salvation and a genuine Christian community look like?
0:51:45  JPa vs Maggie Ross on hierarchy and consciousness
0:55:20  Announcement next week: Questions from the YouTube chat
0:55:50  Why are liberal institutions susceptible to left wing ideology?
1:04:50  Is current political and cultural polarization good or bad for Church or mix of both? 
1:11:10  Why does the Charismatic Movement gets overlooked?
1:16:25  Questions related to Wokism Transcending video / secret sacred self vs to choose identity in God
1:26:55  Is true materialism never been tried, now Harvard physicists say we’re made by aliens?
1:28:00  What’s PVK’s stance on cheese only pizza?
1:28:45  More dimensions for the SSM discussion / slippery slope vs integration of faith
1:38:15  Importance incarnation vs sacrifice and resurrection
1:42:45  Is the Estuary website for sale?
1:44:45  How should we approach ancient distant Christian sibling churches?
1:51:10  Is Pastor Paul here?
1:52:00  Hans Mueller / Kant has a bad moral philosophy (kill illegitimate child)
1:58:10  Shout out to Mark Lefebvre, Chad the Alcoholic, Grizwald Grimm (young YouTubers) / Closing remarks
2:07:10  End of transmission
